doc.title: Chloroformed Damsels
doc.plot: When a horny woman chloroforms her lovely roommate to fondle her lovely body, she should have realized that the roommate would soon exact revenge. Unfortuantely for the lovely ladies, a voyeuristic neighbor decides to join the fun and soon the girls are the unconscious victims of his roving hands. In other scenes, a secretary is captured by a hit-man before she can turn over incriminating documents to the authorities and is forced to endure a drugged interrogation. In the final vignette, a lovely college student is chloroformed and groped by a crazed professor.
